subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Bill Arnold scored with 6.4 seconds left in overtime to lead No. 3 Boston College to a 3-2 victory over No. 2 Boston University in the Beanpot.
snippet: Bill Arnold scored with 6.4 seconds left in overtime to lead No. 3 Boston College to a 3-2 victory over No. 2 Boston University in the Beanpot.
